toys.toyTitle: Mattel Little Mommy Talk with Me Repeating Doll
toys.description: Mattel’s baby doll toy is sure to make your little princess giggle, laugh and have loads of fun. The little mommy doll comes with a button on her belly that needs to be pushed by your little one to be able to talk for recording. Once the button is released, the baby doll toy repeats what has just been recorded. This cutie not just repeat the words and phrases recorded but also comes with her own funny phrases, enough to keep your little one amused for hours. To add more fun, Mattel has added a cute bunny puppet and sipper that easily fit in the little mommy doll’s hands.
shortDescription: This giggly toddler doll has a lot to say
Push and hold the button on her tummy to record words and phrases

toys.description: Transforming Auto bot Car cum Radio Control Transformer. No assembly required. Sound effects when transforming Controls: forward, backward, left and right. Transforms from Robot to Car in one button click. The remote control requires 2 AA batteries (not included).Rechargeable with USB Cable Full function.
shortDescription: Dazzling light adds to the fun and action

toys.toyTitle: Hot Wheels FCN82 Alien Invasion Track Set
toys.description: Aliens have invaded the city and whole civilization is endangered. Attack the aliens and destroy their existence on Earth. Combat aliens to reach the mother spaceship

toys.toyTitle: Little Genius - Watering Can with Gardening Tool
toys.description: Little Genius Toys develop educational toys to provide educators with a comprehensive and effective means of transmitting information and to help modernize educational methods. Unique design, make your kids more attractive.This set is bound to have hours of fun play and joy for kids. This play set is great for fun on the beach or sandpit, wheelbarrow, scoop, gardening spade, watering can are safe and easy to use for hours of fun for toddlers and children, great value for money and is produced in ;lovely bright colours.
shortDescription: Made of good quality and Light Weighted

toys.description: Climb up into Mia's tree house bed and help her use the walkie-talkie to invite her friends round to play. Jump on the skateboard and practice your skills on the ramp. Have fun with her pet bunny twister and make sure he has enough to eat, before grabbing the skateboard or paddle and setting off with Mia for outdoor adventures.
shortDescription: Includes a Mia mini-doll figure, plus a twister the bunny figure
Accessory elements include a skateboard, paddle, walkie-talkie, carrot and a basket

toys.description: Children can play safely with these toys as they are no toxic in nature.Constitutes of 6 Cubes of 7 cm each. Lightweight. Non-toxic Material. Educational toys made for your overall kids development.
shortDescription: Educational toys made for your overall kids development
Light in weight,each cube of 7 cm

toys.description: Introduce children to different shapes as each puzzle set consists of the shape as the center piece and two objects of the same shape as the other piece. Self correcting pieces ensure that the concept is learnt correctly right from the start .
shortDescription: Provide your kids endless amount of fun

toys.description: Charlie – Sit 'n ride Plane.The new ride on with an amusing expression helping babies develop their motor skills and entertain them thanks to lots of manual activities: the propeller turns, the lever moves up and down and the compass rotates with a cracking sound.
shortDescription: Sit 'n ride:allows the child to move around independently moving his legs.
First steps:helps the child to stand up while taking his first steps, offering a handy support on the back handle.
